page.title: 03Our School
page.content: Our school is in{Hook}.It has about ninety-nine pupils and five classrooms ,one of which is a spare classroom.The school has five teachers:they are called{Mrs Christie,Mrs Ellis,Mrs {Clift,Mrs Rendall}and{Mr Walker.Mr {Walker}is also our Head Master.There are about six dinner ladies in the School Kitchen.Our school is eight years old,but on the wall it has the date stone of the old school of{Hook . We use the spare classroom for baking in.The third year do baking on Monday and the top class do baking on Tuesday.We start school in the year we are five and finish at the age of nine .We have two pets both of which are rabbits and they are both girls.
